1.name: Metropolis
1.description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

2.name: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
2.description: An allegorical tale about a man fighting the good and evil within him. Both sides are made flesh - one a sophisticated woman he is attracted to and the other his wife.

3.name: Wings
3.description: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

4.name: The Jazz Singer
4.description: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.

5.name: London After Midnight
5.description: The abandoned home of a wealthy man who supposedly committed suicide five years earlier is taken over by ghoulish figures - could they be vampires?

6.name: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
6.description: A landlady suspects her new lodger is the madman killing women in London.

7.name: It
7.description: A salesgirl with plenty of "it" (sex appeal) pursues a handsome playboy.

8.name: The Unknown
8.description: A criminal on the run hides in a circus and seeks to possess the daughter of the ringmaster at any cost.

9.name: Napoléon vu par Abel Gance
9.description: A film about the French general's youth and early military career.

10.name: 7th Heaven
10.description: A street cleaner saves a young woman's life, and the pair slowly fall in love until war intervenes.

11.name: Oktyabr
11.description: A large-scale view on the events of 1917 in Russia, when the monarchy was overthrown.

12.name: The Cat and the Canary
12.description: Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 20th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.

13.name: Underworld
13.description: Boisterous gangster kingpin Bull Weed rehabilitates his former lawyer from his alcoholic haze, but complications arise when he falls for Weed's girlfriend.

14.name: The Ring
14.description: Two boxers compete for the love of a woman.

15.name: The King of Kings
15.description: Jesus Christ faces religious and political oppression during his ministry and in the days before his death and resurrection.

16.name: Two Arabian Knights
16.description: Two American soldiers are captured by the Germans on the Western Front during World War One and escape a POW camp only to stumble into further life-threatening adventures when they come across an Arabian king's daughter while on the lam.

17.name: Downhill
17.description: Public schoolboy Roddy Berwick is expelled from school when he takes the blame for a friend's charge and his life falls apart in a series of misadventures.

18.name: The Kid Brother
18.description: A sheriff's milquetoast son has a chance to prove himself when a medicine show run by con artists comes into town.

19.name: Chicago
19.description: Based on a true crime story, the movie is about a wild jazz-loving and boozing wife Roxie Hart who kills her boyfriend in cold blood after he leaves her, and how she finagles her way out ...                See full summary »

20.name: College
20.description: To reconcile with his girlfriend, a bookish college student tries to become an athlete.

21.name: The Private Life of Helen of Troy
21.description: Queen Helen of Troy, in response to her husband Menelaus' lack of interest in her, elopes with Paris to Sparta. Menelaus, egged on by his henchman, starts a war with Paris, finally ...                See full summary »

22.name: The Gaucho
22.description: A girl is saved by a miracle after she falls from a cliff in the Argentine Andes, and is blessed with healing powers. A shrine is built on the site, and a whole city grows around it, rich ...                See full summary »

23.name: Uncle Tom's Cabin
23.description: Slavery tears apart a black family in the South before the start of the Civil War.

24.name: Annie Laurie
24.description: The story of the famous battle between the Scots clans of Macdonald and Campbell, and the young woman who comes between them, Annie Laurie.

25.name: The Enemy
25.description: Carl Behrend, son of a wealthy businessman, marries Pauli Arndt, daughter of a pacifist professor. When World War I breaks out, Carl is drafted. Pauli and her family and friends are left ...                See full summary »

26.name: The Way of All Flesh
26.description: The story takes place in Milwaukee during the early 1900s with a bank clerk named August Schiller who is happy with both his job and his family. He is tasked with transporting $1,000 in ...                See full summary »

27.name: Children of Divorce
27.description: A young flapper tricks her childhood sweetheart into marrying her. He really loves another woman, but didn't marry her for fear the marriage would end in divorce, like his parents'. Complications ensue.

28.name: Love
28.description: A married woman compromises her social standing and family life when she falls for a young officer.

29.name: Tretya meshchanskaya
29.description: A married couple have a small apartment in Moscow. When an old friend of the husband's arrives in the city, he is unable to find lodgings. Kolia, the husband, invites his friend to move in with them.

30.name: My Best Girl
30.description: A department store's stock girl falls in love with a co-worker, the son of the store's manager; the feeling is mutual though he is engaged to a debutante and focusing on becoming successful without the influence of his father.

31.name: Konets Sankt-Peterburga
31.description: A peasant comes to St. Petersburg to find work. He unwittingly helps in the arrest of an old village friend who is now a labor leader. The unemployed peasant is also arrested and sent to ...                See full summary »

32.name: Ham and Eggs at the Front
32.description: Fifi, (Mryna Loy), a dusky, sultry Senegalese spy, uses her wiles to get information out of two American army soldiers, Ham, (Tom Wilson), and Eggs, (Heinie Conklin), in France during World War One.

33.name: La sirène des tropiques
33.description: Marquis Sévéro, a rich, lazy Parisian, wants to divorce his wife so that he can marry his own goddaughter Denise. But Denise herself loves André Berval, an engineer employed by the marquis....                See full summary »

34.name: The Show
34.description: Performers in a Budapest sideshow encounter love, greed, and murder.

35.name: The Student Prince in Old Heidelberg
35.description: A cloistered, overprotected Austrian prince falls in love with a down-to-earth barmaid in this "Viennese fairy tale."

36.name: The Scar of Shame
36.description: An educated, upscale young black musician marries a woman from a lower socioeconomic class to get her out of the clutches of her stepfather, who beats and abuses her. However, once he "...                See full summary »

37.name: Orchids and Ermine
37.description: A telephone operator at an opulent hotel falls in love with a young man who turns out to be a rich oil millionaire.

38.name: Mockery
38.description: During the Russian Revolution, a mentally challenged peasant saves then obsesses over a beautiful countess.

39.name: Twelve Miles Out
39.description: Jerry always wins in his rivalry with Red over women, gunrunning, and diamond smuggling. While running booze into the U.S. during Prohibition, Jerry seizes Jane's seaside home. When she ...                See full summary »

42.name: Mr. Wu
42.description: When Mandarin Wu's unmarried daughter becomes pregnant by a young Englishman, he seeks vengeance.

43.name: The Drop Kick
43.description: College football player Jack Hamill finds his reputation on the line when he pays an innocent visit to a woman whose husband kills himself.

44.name: The Beloved Rogue
44.description: François Villon, in his lifetime the most renowned poet in France, is also a prankster, an occasional criminal, and an ardent patriot.

45.name: Sorrell and Son
45.description: Stephen Sorrell, a decorated war hero, raises his son Kit alone after Kit's mother deserts husband and child in the boy's infancy. Sorrell loses a promising job offer and is forced to take ...                See full summary »

46.name: Tiptoes
46.description: A silent film version of the Gershwin stage musical

48.name: Man, Woman and Sin
48.description: A young man takes a succession of odd jobs in order to save enough money to buy he and his mother a house. He lands a position in a newspaper office and falls in love with the beautiful ...                See full summary »

49.name: Hans engelska fru
49.description: Two English gentlemen of the upper class, Ivor Willington and Lionel Jessop, play a card game about who will get the young beautiful widow Cathleen Paget and her fortune after her grieving year is over.

50.name: Mother Machree
50.description: Ellen McHugh, a poor Irish immigrant to America, finds work in a carnival and is thus able to send her son Brian to a fine school. But when her position is found out, the school expels ...                See full summary »
